name: LAHA: Gallery of Memories
description:
Welcome to the LAHA Gallery of Memories!

Walk around in a small virtual museum and experience highlights from the Fitchburg State University trip in Los Angeles, California and Hawai'i. Our trip lasted 13 days, from May 17th to May 30th 2022. Find images from the various locations we visited, such as the WayForward Headquarters, Disneyland, Pearl Harbor National Museum and more.  Be sure to collect all the souvenirs before you go home!

Developed By
  • Albert Townsend- Music & SFX Composer
  • Zach Shirikjian - Developer, Programmer, UI/Game Designer, Voice Actor
